src:
Musim Hujan, Harga Sayuran di Pasar Bener Meriah Merosot Turun
03 Nov 2019, 17:33 by Yasman Solida



Musim Hujan, Harga Sayuran di Pasar Bener Meriah Merosot Turun



Musim Hujan, Harga Sayuran di Pasar Bener Meriah Merosot Turun


KBRN, Redelong: Memasuki musim hujan harga sayuran di pasar Simpang Tiga Redlong Kabupaten Bener Meriah mengalami penurunan, komoditas sayur yang turun diantaranya, cabe rawit, cabe merah, kol, tomat dan brokoli.
Salah satu pedagang Juniar kepada RRI mengatakan menurunya harga beberapa komoditas sayuran tersebut saat ini masih tergolong stabil.
“harga sayuran makin turun namun masih bisa dikatakan satabil seperti tomat sekarang sudah Rp 2000 dari sebelumnya Rp 4000, Kol menjadi Rp 1000 perkilogram Sebelumnya Rp 2500 hingga 3000, cabe rawit sama cabe merah sekarang Rp 30 000 dari sebelumnya 45 000 perkilogramnya kemudian brokoli juga sudah turun menjadi Rp 18 000 dari sebelumnya Rp 25 000 perkilogramnya,” jelasnya, Minggu (3/11/2019).
Lebih lanjut Juniar menambahkan di komoditas lain hanya sayuran seperti bawang merah yang mengalami kenaikan dari harga sebelumnya Rp 15 000 menjadi Rp 25 000 Perkilogramnya.
text:
The Rainy Season, Vegetable Prices in the Merdeka Market Lower Down
03 Nov 2019, 17:33 by Yasman Solida



The Rainy Season, Vegetable Prices in the Merdeka Market Lower Down



The Rainy Season, Vegetable Prices in the Merdeka Market Lower Down


KBRN, Redelong: Entering the rainy season the price of vegetables at the Simpang Tiga Redlong market in Bener Meriah Regency has decreased, vegetable commodities have declined including, cayenne pepper, red chili, cabbage, tomatoes and broccoli.
One Juniar trader told RRI that the fall in prices of some of these vegetable commodities was still relatively stable.
"The price of vegetables has decreased, but it can still be said to be stable like tomatoes, now it has been Rp. 2000 from Rp. 4000, cabbage to Rp. 1000 per kilogram. Previously, Rp. 2500 to 3000, cayenne pepper and red chillies are now Rp. 30,000 from the previous 45,000 per kilogram, then broccoli has also been decreased to Rp. 18 000 from the previous Rp. 25 000 per kilogram, "he explained, Sunday (3/11/2019).
Furthermore Juniar added that in other commodities only vegetables such as shallots had increased from the previous price of Rp 15,000 to Rp 25 000 per kilogram.
